attributes.action: implement all possible measures to stop people texting while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I saw a report on the news which said many drivers still send texts while driving; and most of those who do this seem quite happy to continue doing so in spite of the fact that innocent people have been KILLED as a result.  This should be punished at least as severely as drunk driving since it is just as dangerous and selfish.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
